channel.title: CVE Feed for Red Hat -- Soteria
channel.description: The latest CVEs for Red Hat -- Soteria

item.title: CVE-2020-1732|2024-08-04T06:46:30.866Z -- red%20hat -- soteria
item.description: A flaw was found in Soteria before 1.0.1, in a way that multiple requests occurring concurrently causing security identity corruption across concurrent threads when using EE Security with WildFly Elytron which can lead to the possibility of being handled using the identity from another request.
